author: TheMaster
releaseNotes: Added force dry for sensors that get out of sync

drivers.name: Utilitech Water Sensor
drivers.description: Improved Everspring/Utilitech Water Sensor with presence and better drop out detection,battery support,and settings, Support to stop the device from drooping off with dead batteries by providing presence and dead bat detection.with info debug and trace logs. Prease read info in driver undocumented hubitat bug with this device may make re-pair very hard (READ FIX)
